author: remm
msg: - Make the build system of the webapp connector similar to the other j-t-c
components, at least for the Java side of the connector.

author: remm
msg: - Don't do install-tc40 in build-main (I really prefer doing that on demand using the install target).

author: remm
msg: - ajp.jar did include the tomcat-util classes, which was unneeded.
- Also separate JK from JK2 in a separate jar.
- If there's a problem with that patch for whatever reason, let me know.
